mapper.select: SELECT ual.anime_id AS animeId, a.title_kor AS title, a.cover_image_url AS coverImageUrl FROM UserAnimeLike AS ual JOIN Anime AS a ON ual.anime_id = a.anime_id WHERE ual.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ual.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size}

SELECT ulva.voiceactor_id AS personId, va.name_kor AS name, va.profile_image AS profileImageUrl FROM UserLikedVoiceActor AS ulva JOIN VoiceActor AS va ON ulva.voiceactor_id = va.voiceactor_id WHERE ulva.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ulva.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size}
